Overview¶

The client is built using JavaScriptMVC and jQuery .

It is also built upon strict organization:

  • pyofwave_client/pyofwave_client.html stores the final user experience along with the files in the same directory.
  • api/ stores all dependancies.
  • pyofwave_client/api/ stores the building blocks upon which pyofwave_client.html is built.
  • gadget/ stores the gadget iframe environment.
